entry.title: Ukraine Says It Sank Two Russian Naval Vessels
entry.content: Ukraine said it sank the boats in the Black Sea with drone strikes, as explosions rang out once again in Russiaâ€™s border region of Belgorod and heavy fighting continued in eastern Ukraine. Ukrainian authorities Monday began welcoming civilians evacuated from Mariupol.

entry.title: Facing a Wheat Crisis, Countries Race to Remake an Entire Market on the Fly
entry.content: With war in Ukraine upending global grain trade, other countries scramble to fill the gap in supplies, but soaring prices threaten to worsen food insecurity in poor regions.

entry.title: Shanghai Residents Protest Lockdown With Marches, Smashed Vegetables and Art Projects
entry.content: Discontent has been widespread on Chinese social media ever since Shanghai started a rigid lockdown in late March. Now, it is moving into the real world.
